existing_features.title: Add the uploaded image file `myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg` to the frontend static assets and use it as the Hero section full-width background image.
Keep all existing Hero section content (headline text, description text, buttons, layout, and scroll indicator) unchanged while swapping only the background image.

Use the uploaded image as-is (no cropping, retouching, color adjustments, or generated variants); only apply the existing hero overlay/gradient and CSS positioning needed to display it as a background.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set the uploaded image as the main hero section full-width background, keeping existing hero content unchanged and using the image as-is (no cropping/optimization).
